response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which holds immense value to both of us. Given its worth of $1,200,000 to you, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase it at a special price of $1,100,000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a product that has been meticulously crafted to meet your specific needs and expectations. I believe this offer presents an excellent value proposition, allowing you to secure the product at a discount while still maximizing my earnings. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this product into your possession.", "product_price": 1100000}
